channel.title: Aerospace on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Aerospace on FinanClub

item.title: DAL
item.description: score:113 Chances: Delta Air Lines is expanding its flights to tourist-friendly destinations in Latin America and the Caribbean, indicating potential growth in those markets. The commercial aerospace recovery is expected to continue in 2024, making it a good sector to invest in. American Express and Delta Air Lines are revamping their co-branded credit cards, offering new rewards and benefits that could attract more customers.

item.title: RTX
item.description: score:210 Chances: RTX has a golden opportunity to restart a 40-year-old missile business. Raytheon, with its recent contract with the U.S. Airforce, is set to expand its footprint in the missiles defense market. RTX’s Raytheon is set to expand its footprint in the global radar market, with the GhostEye MR contributing to the needs of the U.

item.title: RKLB
item.description: score:-27 Chances: Rocket Lab USA, Inc. has been selected by the Space Development Agency to design and build 18 Tranche 2 Transport Layer-Beta Data Transport Satellites, showcasing the company’s continued growth and expansion in the aerospace industry.
